content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, it's great to meet you as well. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. We'll get straight to the point. I'm looking for a monthly rental price that will allow me to maximize my gains on this property. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you give me some information about the apartment? What is the rental price you have in mind?
User 1: The apartment is a 25 square meter studio in the city center of Munich. It's fully furnished and has all the necessary amenities. As for the rental price, I'm looking for something around €800-€900 per month. However, I'm open to negotiation if there are any concessions I can make. What's your budget and what are you willing to offer?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand. My budget is around €750 per month, but I'm willing to negotiate. What are your thoughts on that price range?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am open to negotiating within that range. Can you tell me more about the apartment?
User 1: Sure, the apartment is located in a prime location in the city center, close to public transportation, shops, restaurants, and entertainment venues. It has a modern kitchen, a comfortable bedroom, and a cozy living area. The apartment is also equipped with central heating and air conditioning, which will make it comfortable throughout the year.

I'm open to negotiating within the €750-€900 range, but I'm looking for a tenant who will take care of the apartment and pay rent on time. I also expect my tenant to respect my privacy and not disturb my neighbors. If you're interested in the apartment and can meet these requirements, we can work out a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Understood. I'm willing to agree to a rental price of €750 per month, provided that the apartment is in good condition and I have access to the utilities. Additionally, I assure you that I will take care of the apartment and pay rent on time. Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Heinrich Heine
